programmes.show_description: Deep blue horror. A crew of an underwater nuclear base fight for their lives when an alien menace at the bottom of the ocean is disturbed.
Action adventure with Dolph Lundgren. A mother has one night to fulfil a set of horrific demands set by a notorious mob boss if she wants to see her son alive again.

After fighting over bad checks and missing money, an argument between ex-lovers escalates to 'unique' car vandalism.
A landscaper is accused of trying to scam an airplane owner out of his plane; he is sued for damages.
father and daughter team up on a step-mother to sue for an unpaid loan and for an allegedly false restraining order.

programmes.show_name: Donal MacIntyre: A Life In Crime
programmes.show_description: For over 30 years, Donal MacIntyre has worked as an investigative reporter. This documentary is the story of Donal's life in crime.
In 2004, the body of Stephen Schulhoff was discovered beaten to death. His daughter Courtney Schulhoff, 16, and her boyfriend, are found guilty and sentenced to life.
New Year's Eve in Pampa, Texas ends in triple homicide. Twila Busby and her two adult sons are found dead in their home. Her boyfriend Hank Skinner is found guilty.
In 2002, the Chishti family from Huddersfield, UK, were victims of a fatal arson attack, which killed eight family members including five children.
Surjit Athwal from Coventry, UK was forced into an arranged marriage at 16. In 1998, she was lured to India under the false promise of a divorce and never returned.

A '60s hack-writer's work is given a new lease of life when he collaborates with William Shakespeare. Guest starring Burt Reynolds.
Fact-based drama with Ethan Hawke. A plane carrying a college rugby team crashes in the Andes, and as supplies dwindle, the survivors are faced with the horrifying prospect of eating the dead.
Action thriller with Charlie Sheen. A skydiving instructor helps a beautiful Russian spy foil an international criminal conspiracy to steal a fortune in bullion.
Fast-paced action with Dave Bautista. When a US-based military force invades their Brooklyn neighbourhood, 20-year-old Lucy and war veteran Stupe must depend on each other to survive.
Action with David Carradine. As the Vietnam War comes to an end, one man embarks on a life-threatening mission to free a group of American prisoners held in a secret Vietcong camp.

After Angela Craig died, her autopsy revealed she had been poisoned and police claimed the evidence pointed to her husband.
